Exit Interview/Questionnaire

We strongly encourage you to complete the Exit Questionnaire on EBS under HR Employee Self-Service or / and if you wished to add further comments please arrange an Exit Interview with your line manager. on EBS under HR Employee Self-Service.

This will help us to understand the reasons for you leaving PCC and your experiences whilst working here.

We will use this information to help us improve employee's experience in the future.
